com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers

Class DatePickerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.FormElementController
      • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers.LabeledFieldController
        • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers.DatePickerController

  • public class DatePickerController
extends LabeledFieldController
    Represents a field that allows selecting a specific date via a date picker.

    For the field value, the associated FormModel must return a Date instance. No selected date can be represented by returning null for the value of the field.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatePickerController(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String labelText)
      Constructs a new instance of a date picker field, with the selected date displayed in "MMM d, yyyy" format.
      DatePickerController(android.content.Context ctx, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String labelText, boolean isRequired, java.text.SimpleDateFormat displayFormat)
      Constructs a new instance of a date picker field.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatePickerController

        public DatePickerController(android.content.Context ctx,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String labelText,
                    boolean isRequired,
                    java.text.SimpleDateFormat displayFormat)
        Constructs a new instance of a date picker field.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the Android context
        name - the name of the field
        labelText - the label to display beside the field. Set to null to not show a label.
        isRequired - indicates if the field is required or not
        displayFormat - the format of the date to show in the text box when a date is set

      • DatePickerController

        public DatePickerController(android.content.Context context,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String labelText)
        Constructs a new instance of a date picker field, with the selected date displayed in "MMM d, yyyy" format.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the field
        labelText - the label to display beside the field
